title: All structural layouts and structural design related with plan and development on the basis of details received from architect / owner / builder / developer / geo technical consultant
clause_text: All structural layouts and structural design related with plan and development on the basis of details received from architect / owner / builder / developer / geo technical consultant. Wherever required, structural engineer shall availthe services / advice of Geotechnical Engineer.
section: C-4.3 Duties and Responsibilities of Structural Engineer

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
